alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 12:44AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River above Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha and Moody Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River above Dell Rapids. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1481.0 feet, agricultural flooding upstream of Dell Rapids begins, and the City Park and ball fields on the right bank in Dell Rapids will begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1481.9 feet. This value may be affected by ice. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 AM CDT Monday was 1481.9 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1481.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Dell Rapids 1481.0 1481.9 Mon 1 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM CDT.
